headline: Kimco Realty® Management to Present at the BofA Securities 2025 Global Real Estate Conference
summary: ® JERICHO, New York, Sept. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kimco Realty® (NYSE: KIM) announced today that members of its management team will present at the BofA Securities 2025 Global Real Estate Conference on Wednesday, September 10, 2025. The webcast information is as follows: When: Wednesday, September 10, 2025 from 3:45 PM – 4:20 PM, ET Live Webcast: Kimco Realty Presentation Link Audio from the conference will be available on Kimco Realty’s investor relations website until December 10, 2025.

headline: Shopping Center REITs: Undervalued Despite Growth Ramp
summary: Shopping center REITs are poised for outsized returns with low vacancies, robust rental growth, and market catalysts. Read here for more analysis.
